mapper.select: select * from room where room_no = #{roomNo} and users_id = #{usersId}
mapper.insert: insert into room(room_no, room_title, room_owner) values(#{roomNo}, #{roomTitle}, #{roomOwner})
mapper.select: select * from room order by room_no desc
mapper.delete: delete room where room_no = #{roomNo} and account_id = #{accountId}
